page.title: 12HOME LIFE-PETS
page.content: We did a survey amongst{45 families} to find out the type of pets kept in the village. {19}families had{cats.} {16}families had{dogs}(4 sheepdogs 7 labradors 4 Jack Russels 1 Rottwi- ler.)Of the families that kept dogs 63% were kept as guard dogs. {12}families had{Goldfish} {4}families had{budgies} {1}families had{horse} {2}families had{calves} {2}families had{hens} {1}families had{ducks} {2}families had{guinea pigs} {3} families had{rabbits} {3}families had{hamsters } {3}families had{tortoises} Most pets were fed on tinned or dried food from local supermarkets. 56% of the families kept their pets inside.
